Author: guillotink
Text: thank you for your comment, im sadly too emotionally unstable to weigh myself again anytime soon, so ill just say it was indeed water retention oof

Author: ilovesnailsndflowers
Text: There's not very much info in your post but I'd still say it's most likely from water retention (especially if you ate salty food). If you're near your cycle your body also tends to hold onto water.  Edit: Also, if you weighed yourself after travelling it's possible you were dehydrated and weighed less than you normally would.
